title.narrative: Strengthening UK-China infrastructure investment in developing countries as part of the Belt and Road Initiative

description.narrative: The project will include a High-Level stakeholder engagement roundtable and a Belt and Road Financing Workshop, to discuss obstacles to and recommendations for progressing infrastructure project delivery and financing along the Belt and Road, leveraging international expertise, best practices and methodologies. The project is designed to contribute to the sustainable development of infrastructure projects in developing countries, primarily along the Belt and Road (BRI) region. The overall programme will lead to more productive, higher quality and greener overseas infrastructure investment that delivers social and economic benefits and contributes to poverty alleviation. It will also generate opportunities for international business, Bringing benefits to British business in sectors where they are well placed to compete including; Rule of Law, Energy and Low Carbon, Financial Services and Infrastructure.
